review: The doctor was very polite, listened to all our concerns before providing the treatment. We are pretty much satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After using many medicines for more than 20 days, the cough was not getting reduced and finally consulted Dr.Ashok and he suggested few changes in medicines and asked to use for 10 days.  I felt the relief within 4-5 days but continued the medication for 10 days as per doctors advice to not stop medication even after the symptoms disappear.  Thank you Dr.Ashok.

review: ** ** * **** **** ********** understands the problem very well and his presentation makes the problem vanish with in 2 days. Great. I had cough for 20 days, without being cured by 2 physicians, but after seeing  Dr. Ashok Vardhan sir, cough disappeared in only 2 days.
He is a nice doctor. He listened to the problem patiently and prescribed the appropriate medicine which made me feel better
